name: Rule of Thirds
subtitle: Balance and dynamic tension
philosophy: Let the subject breathe within the frame.

name: Golden Spiral
subtitle: Natural visual flow
philosophy: Guide attention along a quiet curve.

name: Symmetry
subtitle: Reflections and balance

name: Framing
